text: @PressSec @kimguilfoyle It's unfortunate that #COVID19 has claimed the life of yet ANOTHER American citizen. As you know, covid19 disproportionately affects racial & ethnic minority groups . If only the Trump administration had taken this virus seriously from the beginning we'd have less of a death toll
